main event: An object was observed over Bethlehem, Connecticut on July 8, 1961.
interesting points: The object was described as a red light on the western horizon where no lights were typically present,The observation lasted for about 15 minutes and seemed to disappear behind high thin clouds,The sighting was reported during night conditions,The eyewitness included Captain Wilbur S., a retired U.S.A.F. pilot,Two young boys corroborated the sighting as having witnessed the event.
witness description: Captain Wilbur S. and two young boys aged 12
